original_title: Your War (I'm One of You): 20 Years of Joan of Arc
overview: Your War (I'm One Of You) chronicles the life and career of Chicago's Tim Kinsella, frontman of ever-shifting band Joan of Arc and '90's pioneers Cap'n Jazz. With appearances from Tim's friends, family, and admirers, we learn what has made his legacy so unique and enduring for more than 20 years.
title: Your War (I'm One of You): 20 Years of Joan of Arc
